description: Returns metrics about all findings in an account within a specified time range.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the interval which you want to retrieve metrics from. Round to the nearest day.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the interval which you want to retrieve metrics from. Rounds to the nearest day.

nested_items.name: findingsMetrics
nested_items.description: A list of AccountFindingsMetric objects retrieved from the specified time interval.

nested_items.name: closedFindings
nested_items.description: The number of closed findings of each severity on the specified date.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a critical finding.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a high severity finding.

nested_items.name: info
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to an informational finding.

nested_items.name: low
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a low severity finding.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a medium severity finding.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date from which the findings metrics were retrieved.

nested_items.name: meanTimeToClose
nested_items.description: The average time in days it takes to close findings of each severity as of a specified date.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a critical finding.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a high severity finding.

nested_items.name: info
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to an informational finding.

nested_items.name: low
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a low severity finding.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a medium severity finding.

nested_items.name: newFindings
nested_items.description: The number of new findings of each severity on the specified date.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a critical finding.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a high severity finding.

nested_items.name: info
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to an informational finding.

nested_items.name: low
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a low severity finding.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a medium severity finding.

nested_items.name: openFindings
nested_items.description: The number of open findings of each severity as of the specified date.

nested_items.name: critical
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a critical finding.

nested_items.name: high
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a high severity finding.

nested_items.name: info
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to an informational finding.

nested_items.name: low
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a low severity finding.

nested_items.name: medium
nested_items.description: A numeric value corresponding to a medium severity finding.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token. You can use this in future calls to ListFindingMetrics to continue listing results after the current page.
